tool_description: Filters books based on reader ratings from various sources with configurable thresholds and rating sources.

book_ids.description: Array of book IDs to filter

rating_aggregation.description: How to aggregate ratings: average, weighted_average, or highest

error_messages: Empty book_ids array: Provide at least one book ID to filter.
Invalid rating range: min_rating and max_rating must be between 0.0 and 5.0.
Invalid rating range: min_rating must be less than or equal to max_rating.
Unknown rating source: One or more rating sources are not supported.
Invalid aggregation method: Use one of [average, weighted_average, highest].
Insufficient rating data: No books have enough ratings to meet the min_review_count threshold.
usage: Provide book_ids array and rating criteria. Specify min_rating and/or max_rating to filter by rating thresholds. Use rating_sources to control which rating platforms to consider and min_review_count to ensure statistical significance.

filtered_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs that meet the rating criteria

books_remaining.description: Number of books that passed the rating filter

rating_distribution.description: Count of books in each rating bracket (1-star through 5-star)

sources_used.description: Rating sources that were successfully accessed and used
